name: traccar
description: Traccar is a self-hosted GPS tracking platform that collects location data from various devices and mobile apps. It features real-time map views, alerts, and reports via a rich web UI and mobile-friendly tools, plus a hosted cloud option.
features: Real-time tracking: View device locations on interactive maps with live updates and position history.
Multi-device support: Track hundreds of different GPS device models and mobile apps simultaneously.
Geofencing: Define geographic boundaries and receive alerts when devices enter or exit zones.
Reports: Generate detailed reports on trips, stops, mileage, and device activity for any time period.
Alerts: Set up notifications for speeding, geofence violations, device offline, and other events.
Mobile apps: Track devices using official Android and iOS apps that report location to your server.
Route playback: Replay historical routes with timeline controls to review past trips and movements.
Multi-user: Support multiple users with individual permissions and device access controls.
Web interface: Access tracking features through a modern, responsive web interface from any browser.
API access: Integrate tracking data into other applications using the comprehensive REST API.
Computed attributes: Calculate custom values like fuel consumption or engine hours from device data.
Cloud or self-hosted: Choose between self-hosting for privacy or using the managed cloud service.
